work.name: Cedric lab, CNAM/LEME, Université Paris Nanterre
work.summary: Graph learning enriched with additional metadata associated with nodes, such as labels or attributes not directly related to the observed signals.

work.name: Integrated Energy Solutions team, EDF China R&D
work.summary: Development of the optimisation algorithm for the large-scale district heating/cooling system by using Cplex and python.
highlights: Formulating Mathematical Models: Adapt and refine existing codes to develop mathematical models that address complex, real-world problems.
Optimization Performance Analysis: Analyze and assess the performance of optimization models and algorithms to ensure they meet project objectives.

work.name: Suzhou Weimu Intelligent System
work.summary: Trace explosive detection method based on multi-UAV formation.
highlights: Construction of the trace explosive detection scenario in the Gazebo world.
Development of the reinforcement learning algorithm based on tabular dynamic Q-learning method.
Achievement of the trace explosive detection by using the multi-UAV intelligent formation algorithms.
